messages.subject: Unschooling Podcast?
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry for those who see this several times!  Any other podcast-listeners out there?  Why isn t there a good unschooling one?  People write such incredible,
messages.messageBody:
Sorry for those who see this several times! Any other podcast-listeners out
there? Why isn't there a good unschooling one? People write such
incredible, beautiful, thoughtful things every day! Wouldn't it be great to
have even just a weekly sampling of the best unschooling
writings-of-the-week in audio format?

Anyone interested in doing this? If there's interest, I'd do it but if
someone else is working on it I don't want to steal their thunder. I am
aware of the radio Freeschool program and I enjoy it. But I would like to
see (hear) something regularly and specifically about unschooling, and not
from any one or a few experts but from lots of voices!

Anybody else?



~Q~





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
